name: Move Tab Hotkeys (Chrome Number Pad Keys)
author: Jonathon Merz

move-tab-first-numpad-numlock-on.description: Move the selected tab(s) to the start (Numeric Keypad with NumLock On)

move-tab-first-numpad-numlock-off.description: Move the selected tab(s) to the start (Numeric Keypad with NumLock Off)

move-tab-last-numpad-numlock-on.description: Move the selected tab(s) to the end (Numeric Keypad with NumLock On)

move-tab-last-numpad-numlock-off.description: Move the selected tab(s) to the end (Numeric Keypad with NumLock Off)
